title: Looking for Yum Yum and/or Kalamazoo Bats
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking for Yum Yum and/or Kalamazoo Bats
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris B.
Hello,

I am looking for a Yum Yum or Kalamazoo Bats baseball card - any condition acceptable, but I would prefer an untrimmed one. I am looking to buy or trade (several nice and rare cards available, including a N172 Connie Mack, an E135 Hornsby rookie, and a W600 Mordecai Brown). If you have one available, please email me. To view my cards, feel free to email me or check my website:

[url]http://www.imageevent.com/crb972[/url]

Thanks,

Chris
